title: Change the date of your driving theory test

details.description: Change your driving theory test to an earlier or later date, or change the test centre you take it at
details.more_information:
You'll need your provisional driving licence number.

% You must give at least 3 clear working days’ notice to change your test date or you’ll have to pay again. Sundays and public holidays don’t count as working days. %

##Data protection

You can read the [Data Protection Act 1998 fair processing notice for the Driving Standards Agency (DSA)](/dsa-driving-test-booking-service-data-protection "Data Protection Act 1998 - fair processing notice for DSA") before you start.
details.introduction: Change your driving theory test to an earlier or later date, or change the test centre you take it at.
details.alternate_methods:
##Change by phone

You can change your test by calling DSA.

$C

**DSA theory test bookings and enquiries**  

**Telephone:** 0300 200 1122 (English), 0300 200 1133 (Welsh)  
**Textphone:** 0300 200 1166  
Monday to Friday, 8am to 4pm

$C

*[DSA]: Driving Standards Agency

tags.title: Driving tests and learning to drive

details.description: Includes booking a test, changing and cancelling tests, rules and fees

Book your driving test or get a tax disc online, find out the legal requirements for buying, owning, importing or scrapping a car or motorcycle, and read about your rights and responsibilities as a driver.

related.title: The driving theory test for cars and motorcycles

details.description: Before you book your driving theory test - what the test involves, who needs to take it, how much it costs and how to prepare for it
Book your theory test from £31 using this official theory test booking service - you'll need your provisional licence number and an email address to book online
Cancel your driving theory test if you no longer need your appointment - you'll get a full refund if you give enough notice

related.title: Check, change or cancel your instructor theory test

details.description: Check, change or cancel your approved driving instructor (ADI), large goods vehicle instructor (LGV) or register of post-test motorcycle trainers theory test
